title: EJ Hill Wants to Take You on a Ride
description: Some things about life — and America — “you have to feel in your gut,” this artist says. So he’s building a roller coaster inside a museum.
dc:creator: Siddhartha Mitter
media:credit: Cindy Schultz for The New York Times
media:description: The artist EJ Hill and his working roller coaster named “Brava!” mid-assembly at Mass MoCA in North Adams, Mass.
